subject: How to get the Connection Pool in my test cases
msgSnippet: Hi, I am Thanuja.I am doing my project using axis,xml beans,hibernate and junit test cases. I want to test the connection pool using JUnit test cases. How
messageBody:
Hi,

I am Thanuja.I am doing my project using axis,xml beans,hibernate
and junit test cases.

I want to test the connection pool using JUnit test cases. How
should I test the connection. We are connecting to the database
through datasource name using tomcat server.

Please kindly help me in this.

Thanks & Regards,
Thanuja.
